I didn't realize the sensor light would be so tiny as priorsmoke detectors I owned had much more visible lights.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: LBIgirl
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and most people, even firemen, felt this was a good smoke detector...It was very easy to install where my previous fire alarm was. I was able to used the same screw holes.

Reviews.Title: Installed easily where my old one was
Reviews.Author: MPB
Reviews.Content: Installed easily where my old one was.  I hope it works if needed, but First Alert has a good record, so I feel confident it will.  I really like that it takes AA instead of a 9V, and the side door access to the batteries is much better than my old one.  I had to take it off to get to the back.

Reviews.Title: Smoke & Fire alarm
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Keller
Reviews.Content: Haven't had to use it and hope we never do but it appears to be of good quality and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: First Alert SA320CN Review
Reviews.Author: Wayne K. Kamiya
Reviews.Content: This dual sensor fire and smoke detector is great.  I bought it because it was one of the highest rated in the consumer magazines. The installation is very easy and the unit looks nice on the ceiling.  It's easy to remove from the mounting base, just a quarter turn, when it's time to change the batteries.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: TexasHonda
Reviews.Content: Price was attactive and I was replacing old First Alert smoke detectors (old and suspect). Installation was easy. All checked OK w/ test button and test smoke/fire from butane lighter. I hope I never find out how well they work in practice.

Reviews.Title: Wish First Alert Would Keep the Same Screw Pattern for Mounting Bracket
Reviews.Author: Michael Craddock
Reviews.Content: I have always used First Alert smoke detectors and have never had any complaints about the operation of the detectors themselves. However, I do have a complaint about how the screw pattern for the mounting bracket changes every time I buy one. I purchased this detector and another one at the same time and the mounting brackets were smaller in diameter than the First Alert smoke detectors both were replacing, which meant the mounting screw holes were closer together. In fact, the new brackets were so much smaller than the old ones, that they did not cover the old screw holes, so I had to fill in one of the holes, spackle and paint where one of the screws had been before for each of the detectors.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: P. Mulloy
Reviews.Content: Replaced an older alarm that died. This one has worked for over three years with no problems. It is also easy to install and easy to change the batteries.

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: Mike Starling
Reviews.Content: No nonsense, well made, but reasonably inexpensive unit.  Checked out and almost bought the "other" inexpensive brand that begins with a "K".  Glad I researched it first and bought these units.  Well made, and the reset button for smoke from kitchen mishaps is great.  Finally have protection on all floors and in the master bedroom.

Reviews.Title: First Alert SA320 Smoke and fire alarm
Reviews.Author: Tom Blair
Reviews.Content: This unit was delivered on time and intact. I am satisfied with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone looking for a smoke and fire detector.

Reviews.Title: Forst Alert
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Klein
Reviews.Content: As expected, First Alert offers quality.  The were easy to install and came with batteries.  I only hope to never be awakened by actual need, but they would do the job.

Reviews.Title: Easy Set up, Easy install
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First Alert has been my choice for a nember of years now. When I moved into my current residence I knew exactly what I needed in the form of Fire/smoke detection. I opened the package, popped in the battery and simply twisted it into the ceiling mount bracket. I am comfortable knowing if there is a fire or smoke condition, I'll be alerted in time

Reviews.Title: Need for dual element detector
Reviews.Author: Tennessee Dave
Reviews.Content: My previously installed detectors had been First  Alert, but were only of the ionizing variety,  when upgrading, I chose the same brand.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: H. Salsano
Reviews.Content: Our old unit went bad a couple of weeks before we sold our house.  I bought this one and the holes lined right up and so it was installed in 3 minutes.  Hopefully, it will last a long time and protect the new owners of the house.

Reviews.Title: First Alert SA320CN Double Sensor Battery-Powered Smoke and Fire Alarm
Reviews.Author: Rick H.
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit to replace a 10 yr. old First Alert which was only a single sensor. This one should be better protection at a reasonable price! This unit is slightly smaller in diameter than the old one so you have to drill at least one new hole for the bracket to line up!

Reviews.Title: Good Smoke Alarm
Reviews.Author: Bone Collector
Reviews.Content: Happy to say I haven't gotten to see it in action against a fire or serious smoke.  It looks much better than your standard smoke alarm.  It comes with good Duracell batteries too, which is a plus.

Reviews.Title: No problems to date
Reviews.Author: A. West "dawdler"
Reviews.Content: These were installed several months ago (3 of them). All are working without problems. One battery change was necessary for each unit.

Reviews.Title: Batteries are AA !
Reviews.Author: edro@natick
Reviews.Content: Escape from the 9-volt treadmill !  This unit uses AA batteries, which can be taken out at the recommended 6-month change-over interval,  and then re-used in a small flashlight or tv remote control.

Reviews.Title: a dual detector delight
Reviews.Author: pc in georgia
Reviews.Content: A couple of benefits that I appreciate in this unit are the front access to the batteries (included) which obviously means you will not have to remove the unit from the ceiling or wall. This alone is sufficient for you to want this smoke detector. The other benefit is that it has both types of detectors for fast moving fires and smoldering fires. The detectors are the photoionization-type and particulate-type, I believe that is what it is called.  I gave it four stars because of the benefits.  I hope to never give it 5 stars because in my mind, it worked to alert me and my family to a house fire.

Reviews.Title: Ionization vs photoelectric - this does both. Important!
Reviews.Author: TNT
Reviews.Content: Google "Ionization vs photoelectric" then click on the first link from the National Fire Protection Association. Read about Ionization vs photoelectric before buying any smoke/fire detector.This detector does both, very important.  I've noticed nearly all detectors on this site do one or the other and not both. Some Amazon reviews have stated certain detectors haven't gone off in a room full of smoke as they were the wrong type (scary).Anyway, it arrived today, seems to work fine. Noticed the 'test' button' - you need to push it pretty hard to get a test sound (so 4 stars so far). Not sure if that's normal, will update the review if I have issues or things change.

Reviews.Title: functional but not perfect
Reviews.Author: James A. Pastore
Reviews.Content: LED indicating the detector was not functional.  Too much of a pain to send back.  So now I test weekly.  Quality of unit is suspect

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: K&J
Reviews.Content: So far these work great.. We had some smoke it the kitchen due to food in the bottom for the oven. These went off with very little smoke it the room.. I was very happy with that..

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: alevp45
Reviews.Content: very good product, I highly recommend it, protect your family with this smoke detector, worth buying. if a fire occurs and you would not wake sleeping without a detector that alerts.

Reviews.Title: Met All Expectations
Reviews.Author: Christopher M
Reviews.Content: I was a little wary when purchasing this item after seeing some of the negative reviews.  However, I have not experienced anything negative.  The product was easy to install (fit right where my old one was) and everything works correctly out of the package for the one month I have had it.  Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Fei
Reviews.Content: I bought a bunch for my rental home. It is super sensitive, my tenant tend to take it off the wall when cooking (especially a stake)..

Reviews.Title: Some pluses and minuses
Reviews.Author: Tom from CT
Reviews.Content: I've only had mine alarms up a week or so, so I can't comment on the reliability issues other posters complained of.Pros:-A huge positive point-these alarms take two AA batteries instead of the 9 volt rectangular ones every other alarm uses.  Easier to put in and a whole lot cheaper than the 9v.-As mentioned by others this is a dual sensor alarm-essential feature IMO.-Good and clear instruction manual.Cons:-This is a prime candidate for Amazon's frustration free packaging-it comes in a nearly impenetrable blister pack. Opening the packaging was the hardest part of installation.-Not a beef with this model as such, but why do smoke detector manufacturers insist on having slightly different bases?  Being able to use the already installed base would be ideal but what really bugs me is that the screw hole patterns are just different enough that you have to drill at least one more hole in the ceiling when switching brands.

Reviews.Title: dual sensor and AA batteries make this a good choice
Reviews.Author: Peter P. Lilley
Reviews.Content: I got this model for 2 reasons, it has dual sensor, which every alarm should have and they run on AA batteries.  also the price was good.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, easy everything, easy to monitor
Reviews.Author: John Breeding
Reviews.Content: Easy battery replacement, easy to see for testing. We took out hard wired systems that when one battery got low they all went off. These are also duel signal, fire and smoke.

Reviews.Title: Works well and priced well
Reviews.Author: albert beaulieu
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this item to all my friends.  I was able to install them(2) in a matter of 1/2 an hour

Reviews.Title: Nice Upgrade.
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: It was time to renew and upgrade our Sensors in the house. After doing a bit of research, we decided on these. They are nice solid units.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Whozis
Reviews.Content: I did quite a bit of research before buying this alarm. I had a bit of trouble installing it, as the screw holes did not match to the existing box in the ceiling. I drilled a new hole and finished the installation. I tested it, and it worked, but I am not sure how that it would work in a real case of fire or smoke. Our old alarm was very sensitive and went off when sometime was burned on the stove or in the oven, or even when a lot of steam escaped during cooking. This one does not, so I am hoping that it will work well if we need it to do so. I like the fact that it is rated for both smoke and fire.

Reviews.Title: ~~~~  Hope I Never Have to Use It
Reviews.Author: Adam Smith
Reviews.Content: I now have bought 2 units of this product.  So far I'm pleased.  The main selling point was it detected both smoke and fire.  And that it required 2 AA batteries, whereas others I've used took one D battery.  It was hard for me to remove from its clamshell package, but easy to install the (included) batteries.  When I tested it by pressing the button, it took a while, but finally let out those obnoxious shrieks.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: A person actually never wants to be able to give this item a full review, but it certainly seems good, and the batteries which come with it are much easier to install  and to remove than in previous models I've used.  In fact, the batteries are already installed.

Reviews.Title: Alarms
Reviews.Author: Jeffery J. Clark "Bones"
Reviews.Content: Bought several of these to replace the ones we've had for several years. I trust they will do their job if needed.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: me2
Reviews.Content: Does the job.  Easy to mount, took 2 mintues at most.  Having AA batteries should be standerd in this type of things, will be easy to replace the batteries, it compartment is on the side so you do not have to take the whole thing down.

Reviews.Title: Easy install, nice looking, & seems to work
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah L. Olson
Reviews.Content: This is one of those items I never want to have to write a review about because I actually had to use it.  Unfortunately we had a chimney fire prior to installing these and that is what prompted me to actually by 2 of these.  They were easy to install and I like the way you simply have to turn it to lock it into the ceiling mount.  I also enjoy the fact that it is double A batteries instead of 9 volt.  The instructions were informative and helpful.  I have tested these twice and they work fine in the test.  So far I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: First Alert Double Sensor Smoke Detector
Reviews.Author: Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I really like the fact that they are double sensor and use AA batteries instead of the 9v.  I always have plenty of AA's on hand and they are cheaper.  Easy to install and change batteries.  No issues!

Reviews.Title: First Alert Double Sensor Review
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: The smoke alarm met my expectations and I am pleased with it.  I will continue to shop for other First Alert products.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: R. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: I hesitated given some of the negative reviews, but this works perfectly for my in a travel trailer. I burnt some popcorn in the microwave and it went off, not too soon, but when it should when the smoke got bad. The only one that takes AA batteries that I could find. Nice unit!

Reviews.Title: Cheap and functional
Reviews.Author: James L
Reviews.Content: I chose this sensor as it was a low cost duel-sensor detector. As noted during other reviews; the dual sensors allow the detector to alert on slow smoldering fires as well as high intensity fires.

Reviews.Title: Appears to work ok, so far so good
Reviews.Author: Doug Olson
Reviews.Content: It was easy to install and I like the use of AA batteries rather than 9v.  Like any safety device, you won't know whether it really works until it's needed the most.  I just put my trust in the First Alert reputation.

Reviews.Title: Does its job
Reviews.Author: oldseagull
Reviews.Content: This First Alert Double Sensor Smoke and Fire Alarm replaced a ten year old smoke detector in the hallway outside our bedroom. I had worried that the old detector was just plain worn-out from old age - did not really trust it.  This new and up-to-date alarm from First Alert offers the latest technology.  One plus = it uses AA batteries(included), long lasting and easy to replace when necessary.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Granny 3
Reviews.Content: After reading several reviews on different smoke detectors, I decided to go with the smoke and fire alarm.  First Alert had a decent price, so that's what I ordered.  It doesn't go off every time we use the oven, like our old one did, but when it does go off, you are definitely going to hear it.

Reviews.Title: Another Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: If you do not have the plug in type with the battery back up, then this is the next best step.

Reviews.Title: SO far, so good...
Reviews.Author: Barry J. Connolly
Reviews.Content: Installed easily and so far no false alarms. Of course, unless something sets these devices off you never really know how effective they are. However, I had a similar model and it woke me when my under-the-house oil burner blew a gasket and sprayed steam all through the basement -- so I am hopeful this one will also work when I need it to.

Reviews.Title: Very short battery life and sensitive to shower steam
Reviews.Author: Scott Sitler
Reviews.Content: I bought 6 of these and every single one of them eats batteries alive.  I get only about 3 months per battery set, even when using long life lithium batteries.  Also, these units are sensitive to steam from the shower and will set of an alarm.  I could live with that, but the short battery life is a deal killer.  All 6 of these are going to the municipal waste recycler!

Reviews.Title: if you can only get 1
Reviews.Author: Karl D. Thompson
Reviews.Content: THis sensor is the only one to buy as is covers slow burning and fast flaming fire. One is big particles and the other small. I would not buy a smoke detector that combines smoke and Co2 which is a gas. When buying always make sure that what you get has battery back up. It the power goes out it will still work. You just have to remember to change the battery. I do mine in the fall when we change the clocks.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: D. Drake
Reviews.Content: This smoke detector is defective. It lasted about 3 days and now just goes off constantly when batteries are in. Poor quality, do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Dalen
Reviews.Content: It is load enough to wake me up, it was easy to mount on the wall, and the batteries are easy to install.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: R. Schwenn
Reviews.Content: It mounts easily and has not given us false alarms.  That is about all you can ask for and hopefully I never have to hear it going off in the middle of the night.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install - exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Zacharovich
Reviews.Content: In our house, we have both wired and battery powered smoke alarms. After twenty years, I figured it was time to replace them.For the battery-powered alarms, I chose the First Alert double sensor alarms. I wanted to be protected from both smoke and fire, and this alarm does exactly that.The alarms came with their own battery - an they were AA'a  (yay! no more 9 volts!).The other nice thing about it is that the battery latch door is on the side so you don't have to remove the alarm to replace batteries.As far as installing them - piece of cake!  Couldn't of been any easier.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed.
Reviews.Author: Alabama Momma
Reviews.Content: Right price and delivered fast.  unfortunately First Alert decided to change the placement of the wall mounts so we could not use the screws from our older First Alert Smoke detector.

Reviews.Title: Dual sensor smoke and fire alarm! Seems to work good!
Reviews.Author: Tim Morris
Reviews.Content: I like the dual sensor smoke and fire alarms! They rated the most reliable when detecting a smoldering or an actual fire!!! This seems to be one of the best units to get!

Reviews.Title: Found It! A Breeze!
Reviews.Author: Just shop
Reviews.Content: Tired of going back to stores to learn no longer carry, just a different brand, Amazon made this a breeze, this is a dual excellent for the laundry room area for example, once actually saved us from an electrical fire, dad was so proud of me for having ordered and given to the family unit, gees-yes it's that time of year to remember Loved ones, to take of them, to actuall give a little, heck so glad my family was safe that year GOD BLESS! Merry Christmas,  the smoke alarm alerts you for slow smothering fires like electrical, or for the full blaze like the smoking burning turkey oh oh!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mickey
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time with good packaging. Smoke detectors are well made and  came with easy to follow directions.Would recommend this product to friends.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Alan Joe
Reviews.Content: Ease of installation.  With the toaster smoking, alarm went off in timely manner....So it workedPurchased based on ratings also

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Robert J Furlin
Reviews.Content: The Alarm was easy to install and met my expectations.  I plan to purchase a few more and recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Dual technology means sensitivity to real fires, not toasting smoke
Reviews.Author: Teh Arbitrageur "PM"
Reviews.Content: This is a next-generation alarm, where they've brought together the two common types of detectors: ionization (which detects gasses from fresh burning) and optoelectronic (which detects cloudiness of smoke).  Any genuine fire will produce some of both symptoms, and that's when this will go off.After having countless frustrating false alarms in my old ionization-only unit due to cooking steaks, etc., I'm thrilled at the silence of this one -- the alarm who cries wolf gets ignored, especially by neighbors.  Yet if and when a real fire strikes, I am confident that this will shrill just as early and loudly as any older unit.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Dr Mike
Reviews.Content: I have no issues with this alarm. It is smaller in diameter than the one it replaced, but the height is a little taller. The alarm is nice an loud and would probably wake the dead as the saying goes.

Reviews.Title: be safe and buy the dual sensor
Reviews.Author: John K
Reviews.Content: after watching a you -tube video on fire detectors I threw my old ones out and bought these dual sensor ones.  the old single stage fire detectors are crap.

Reviews.Title: I feel safe.
Reviews.Author: Amoeba
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install, accidentally tested when someone burned some cookies (just smoke, no fire).  It works and silenced when I pushed the button.

Reviews.Title: It is a must for every level in your house
Reviews.Author: Annette1915 "Annette"
Reviews.Content: I bought three Smoke and Fire Alarm for each level of my home.  I have not finish putting two in, but the old ones are still working.  I will work on that within a week.  My family needs all the protection that is necessary to keep them safe.  This is something that is simple to do and update the system every five or six years.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: S. Dupree "Rockaway Bulldogs"
Reviews.Content: this seemed perfect until i read that it is not to be installed over an existing fire alarm electrical hole. well darn it all!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: daybyday "atkinsPro"
Reviews.Content: Does what it is suppose to do. Clear sound heard in all areas of the house. Not so sensitive that a little kitchen odor sets it off. I like that.

Reviews.Title: First Alert SA320CN Double Sensor Battery-Powered Smoke and Fire Alarm
Reviews.Author: MRGW
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product after researchf and find that it is an excellent product.  I feel I have added security in home by having these alarms installed.

Reviews.Title: great smoke alarm
Reviews.Author: Lina
Reviews.Content: we have ordered several of these in the past ~ we like the first alert ~ reliable smoke and fire alarm!

Reviews.Title: practical, 2 sensors
Reviews.Author: Benjamin B. Brink "Benjamin Brink"
Reviews.Content: This smoke alarm senses smoke via two different sensor types. It's appears to have adequate quality for its purpose ie. hasn't given false alarms, no broken buttons etc. It's inexpensive enough that it's great to get a couple extra to share..

Reviews.Title: Dual sensors-excellent alarm
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Just tried tonight-very sensitive and loud. Has dual sensor which is the only way to go with a smoke detector. They must have both detection systems or are virtually useless

Reviews.Title: Pleased with these alarms
Reviews.Author: Kathy Bassette
Reviews.Content: Bought this after reading reviews on different smoke alarms, chose this one because it is supposed to do the job for both fire and smoke. Worried a little about some reviews that complained about it going off when cooking, so far no complaints and I cook all the time. Our electric went off the other night and I mistakenly light a candle right underneath it, it went off. That made me feel good, I thought great, how will I shut this off? That's hubby's job, he's sleeping. I picked the candle up and set it in another spot and the alarm ceased.  We're happy with it, can rest at night more peacefully when our woodstove is keeping us warm.

Reviews.Title: Good budget priced unit
Reviews.Author: R. Myers
Reviews.Content: Nice looking unit with good basic features.  Seems built well enough compared to other detectors.  Not too big.  Battery easy to get to.  Come off of the ceiling easier than my old unit.  Very pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: A good nit for a good price
Reviews.Author: James Konefal
Reviews.Content: This was to replace one that was placed at the far end of the kitchen/hallway on main floor. Easy to install and convenient to get replacement battery in unit. I chose this one since it had dual sensors and would pick up a fire/smoke a lot quicker,  especially adjacent to the kitchen area. A good price and a good unit.

Reviews.Title: This is the technology you need to protect your family...
Reviews.Author: G Y "GY WY"
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy and works well for family protection.  Buy plenty to have throughout the house and be sure to keep the batteries changed.  The double sensor is so much better than the old style...

Reviews.Title: Another Great First Alert Product
Reviews.Author: William Schatz "Exval"
Reviews.Content: Works fine. This is exactly what I was looking for. Every home should have a few of these mounted and checked every 6 months

Reviews.Title: First Alert SA320CN Double Sensor Battery-Powered Smoke and Fire Alarm
Reviews.Author: Neil R Verderber
Reviews.Content: Haven't needed it (thank goodness) so I don't know how it performs, but the 'dual' part of it made it a good choice for the second floor hallway outside the bedrooms so I don't need to have two separate units crowding the ceiling.

Reviews.Title: This Thing Can't Tell Smoke From Cooking Steam
Reviews.Author: Jane Austen "Gladys"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item because the old smoke detector went off every time I cooked a meal. The homeowner has it positioned too close to the kitchen. However this detector purports that it will NOT react to a little cooking steam (I can't even see it) but such is not the case. This thing alarms just like the last one did every time I cook even though the steam is invisible to me. The only problem is that this thing just KEEPS alarming. It is driving me crazy! Don't buy if you expect it to be able to distinguish between smoke and a very little steam.

Reviews.Title: This is good
Reviews.Author: pwsfirewoman
Reviews.Content: This has been a good product. It's easy to use and works great. Nice to have and I sleep better at night knowing it will detect both smoke and fire. Shipping was reasonable and we received it sooner than expected.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Glen W.
Reviews.Content: Does the job, convenient and well designed.  Loud enough when it goes off and provides me with a secure feeling.

Reviews.Title: Works fine and the nice thing is it takes AA batteries.
Reviews.Author: EddieE
Reviews.Content: Works fine so far with no false alarms. I am phasing out my single sensor alarms due to the simple fact I feel that a double sensor alarm is the way to go, come on folks you depend on these things with your life...so why go the cheapest ones or most inefficient ones. The fact that it takes just 2 AA batteries is a plus too, gets you away from buying the expensive 9 volts. I have probably too many detectors in my place but I just feel it is a good sound investment to make for your family and self.  To be prepared for things is the key and this dual sensor type of alarm fits that. I recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: SMOKE ALARM
Reviews.Author: KATHERINE WILSON
Reviews.Content: I REALLY FEEL MORE PROTECTED WITH THE DOUBLE SENSOR. I'VE ALWAYS FELT SMOKE ALARMS ARE CHEAPINSURANCE. I LIKE THE FACT THAT IT EVEN COMES WITH BATTERIES. I BOUGHT 1 FOR THE HOMES OF EACHOF MY LOVED ONES.

Reviews.Title: easy to install and hopefully they will work if or when we need them.
Reviews.Author: Phyllis M Goodroad
Reviews.Content: easy to install and they are small and not very noticeable when installed on the ceiling.They were reasonable as far as price and they are nice looking.

Reviews.Title: Installs Easy
Reviews.Author: Michael Flournoy
Reviews.Content: It's installation is quick and easy.  The test works just fine.  Hopefully testing will be the only activity it sees.

Reviews.Title: Meets most all Home Protection Requirements for Smoke
Reviews.Author: Fred = Southeast Louisiana
Reviews.Content: This Smoke Alarm seems to be one of the most reliable battery-powered Double Sensor Alarms on the market.It is easy to install and easy to replace batteries.

Reviews.Title: Very cost effective.
Reviews.Author: Nick Cornett
Reviews.Content: Installation was a breeze and they function perfectly (tested them out while baking...). About the best value you'll find for a smoke detector.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.Only time will tell.
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I am a duplex landlord and bought several of these for tenant bedrooms. I have installed some and have more to install. I like the concept of a single smoke detector sensing either a fast burning or smoldering type fire which is why I rated this highly. A primary criteria for me will be longevity. The first ones I installed have only been in a month so far. So only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Giersdorf
Reviews.Content: I got these as well as several other types of smoke/fire detectors to have full coverage through the house for various hazards and these work well.  I would recommend these to anyone looking to protect their home and family.

Reviews.Title: Love it and...
Reviews.Author: LISA LOU "LISA MARIE"
Reviews.Content: Love this, after reading reviews I knew I had to have them in our home. I couldn't believe that our regular code alarms wouldn't even alert us if we had a slow smoldering fire that could kill us in no time from the toxic smoke. These should be code...not the other ones. I sleep a lot sounder and know that these could save our lives. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Reviews.Title: I Guess It Works; No Problems So Far.
Reviews.Author: Duane R. Price
Reviews.Content: I installed the alarm and followed the instructions to check if it was working. It was easy to install in upstairs guest bedroom. I have two other alarms in the house (main bedrooms area and basement). They are also First Alert alarms that have been in use for about 10 years without problems. I plan to replace them with this alarm in the near future.

Reviews.Title: First Alert Smoke and Fire Alarm Rating
Reviews.Author: James A.
Reviews.Content: It appears well made, looks good, and installed easily where my old alarm was.  It has both smoke and fire protection features, which is what I was shopping for.

Reviews.Title: Fire Alarms
Reviews.Author: CT
Reviews.Content: I had purchased the same alarms 10 years ago and I am again replacing them with the same kind , the dual detection alarm is a must. The only problem with these new ones is that the mounting plate is a different shape and the alarm attaches differently. This equates to having to replace the mounting plate on the ceiling and since the newer mounting plates are smaller it means some touch up paint or repainting a wall this is a definite minus to a good and trusted product.

Reviews.Title: Priced right, easy to install, performs as promised
Reviews.Author: Robert Blake
Reviews.Content: Great alarms.  Not too sensitive that they go off every time you pop a piece of toast up but they absolutely work.  Long battery life.  Easy to install and they can save your life.  Why would you not buy them?

Reviews.Title: safety firtst
Reviews.Author: Joseph J Pollara
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my aging smoke detectors. These seem to work fine. Nice to have easy replaceable double A batteries.

Reviews.Title: Sleep At Night
Reviews.Author: J. Powell "JP"
Reviews.Content: These give all the protection we need. I installed five of them in about 15 minutes. They are so easy to install and test. I am not "handy" in the home, so I appreciate how seamlessly and easily the installed.

Reviews.Title: Does everything it is supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: prakthad "prakthad"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. It has a dual alarm and regular AA batteries.Hope I dont need to ever see it work.

Reviews.Title: Great item!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Williams
Reviews.Content: This is a much better product than the average smoke detector.  Fortunately I haven't had it go off yet but knowing that it detects smoke and fire helps me feel more secure.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mary S. Bowie "msherier"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace existing alarm which did not protect from both types of fire.  Easy to install and very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Combo First Alert Alarm
Reviews.Author: BILL O'CLOCK "BOC"
Reviews.Content: I installed three in about half an hour. I wanted to get a combination smoke and fire alarm, rather than what they replaced: a fire alarm only. This product requires two double-A batteries rather than a pair of 9-volts. I haven't had them long enough to see how long the batteries last. I haven't had any false alarms, and thankfully I haven't had any real alarms either.

Reviews.Title: Good Price
Reviews.Author: Tony Jordan "Enigma"
Reviews.Content: This price beats the big box stores and its a dual sensor alert-very easy to install-I hope I never hear it go off except when testing it!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Gina Bossini
Reviews.Content: Easy to install I like that it is smoke and fire detector and had good ratings. Able to put on ceiling.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is
Reviews.Author: C. R. Carter
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, no false alarms.  Prior reviews complaining about the flashing light that shows it is working are too picky.  You have to stare at it to see the flashing LED.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Everything you need...
Reviews.Author: Betty L.
Reviews.Content: What more can you ask for?  Double sensors, batteries included, easy to install, and priced right.  I bought five of these - three for our house and two for our son's new condo.  I'm very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: I chose this b/c it has the double sensor in it. I watched Dateline and they were talking about the one sensor fails a lot of times to warn people until its to late but the other is better. So I figured having both should have us covered if God forbid something happens.

Reviews.Title: Good alarm
Reviews.Author: ji zhang
Reviews.Content: Everything works great but a little too sensitive. Would be better if the sensitivity can be adjusted. That is all.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: Haven't had a fire yet so not 100% sure but I like the dual element feature and the fact that they use AA  batteries instead of 9 volt.

Reviews.Title: Safety First
Reviews.Author: Sops "fsop"
Reviews.Content: Good item to keep our family safe from fire and smoke.  Easy to insert battery and install on ceiling. Makes one feel safer.  Will report in a year to determine battery life etc.

Reviews.Title: Good detector
Reviews.Author: Debbie Farley
Reviews.Content: Easy install. Goes hand in hand with the Carbon Monoxide alarm. I feel much safer replacing the units that had been in the house for about 12 years. Good price.

Reviews.Title: Keep your home safer
Reviews.Author: KC Saabway
Reviews.Content: This combo unit was a very good price, easy to install and works very well. Easy to see their excellent quality

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Kris Orange
Reviews.Content: This smoke alarm is easy to install and does not give false alarms from things such as the slight amount of smoke from blowing out a candle. It can be silenced by pushing a button in case of alarm from kitchen smoke or insense which is a nice feature.

Reviews.Title: Best Alarm
Reviews.Author: E. Deboraha Pusateri "Sibelady"
Reviews.Content: This is a great and most reliable type of smoke alarm and well worth the cost. If you are going to buy an alarm- make sure it has BOTH types of sensors.

Reviews.Title: A little faulty
Reviews.Author: Sean E. Elias
Reviews.Content: The package was in great condition and it was real easy to install.  The alarm goes into test mode without issue, blinking red.  However, the flashing green LED for normal operation does not seem to be there.  It must be a bad green LED, because I've tested it several times without issue.  On the plus side, the battery compartment that slides out without needing to remove the alarm from the ceiling mount is real nice.  Let's just hope the trouble chirping will start when the batteries start to dwindle.

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Wolfe "foxiewolf"
Reviews.Content: I no longer get false alarms when I cook.  Recommend this device for in close apartment living.  Three more words.

Reviews.Title: I will order more of this item
Reviews.Author: My gift list for 2014 "Grams"
Reviews.Content: Everyone needs this type of smoke and fire alarm.  Plan to put one in every bedroom after seeing reviews smoke detectors which don't detect fires, just smoke.

Reviews.Title: Works well, gives my wife peace of mind
Reviews.Author: SteveMST
Reviews.Content: I sent this to Chile so that my mother-in-law could have it installed in her apartment. She has a poor sense of smell and tends to leave the stove on, so this unit is perfect since it lets out a loud alarm if there is any smoke detected.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Jason Baker "Jason Baker"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace out-of-date units. It installed easy and tested like it should.Just install the base; insert the brains; and twist.  You're done.The price on Amazon was cheaper than any box store.  I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: We're Safe!
Reviews.Author: jotitdown
Reviews.Content: The state of Washington now requires a carbon monoxide detector in new homes and when selling any home.  So, off to Amazon I went and found the combo smoke alarm AND carbon monoxide detector.  The alarm looks just as pictured and is fairly unobtrusive on the wall.  It was super easy to install and tested just fine, real loud, but fine - you will not sleep through this alarm.  Hopefully I will never need it ....

Reviews.Title: Works for Me...
Reviews.Author: J. Bentley "jimib33"
Reviews.Content: Researched it before buying. Got what I wanted.Tested it and all works fine. Good protection ata good price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ofra Sharon "Shadow's Mom"
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much.  The unit was exactly what I needed for my basement ceiling.  It is a great product.

Reviews.Title: works great, good value!
Reviews.Author: Teresa M. Kreitzer
Reviews.Content: works great, great value, we bought a 2 pack. easy to install.  still working great after a year. everyone needs this.

Reviews.Title: Great item.
Reviews.Author: Curtis Bard "c.bard"
Reviews.Content: Great item. Does both types of detection - a must have for proper smoke / fire warning!Does the job well.Nice transaction and great seller.I would recommend this item to anyone who needs one of these.

Reviews.Title: good smoke alarm
Reviews.Author: CDR
Reviews.Content: I saw some firemen on TV talking about home safety and REALLY recommending dual sensors.  the photoelectric senses smoke much quicker.

Reviews.Title: Features I wanted--good brand
Reviews.Author: jcrews
Reviews.Content: Okay price. I  dont know about reliability or battery lifeWill update if have problems. Searched several brandsfound this to be okay price.

Reviews.Title: Seems to be a nice unit, easy to install
Reviews.Author: H. S. Overman
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these to replace some really old units that I installed in our house 30 years ago.  They were very easy to install.  I had hoped that the holes might match the older units, but they didn't, because these units are slightly smaller in diameter than the older units.  Definitely not a big deal.  Units come with a "lock pin" (plastic) that makes them harder to remove once installed (maybe for rental property where theft might be an issue?).  Installing this is not necessary for proper mounting, so i did not bother.  Battery door is easily accessible.

Reviews.Title: Double-sensor smoke alarms
Reviews.Author: mingjack
Reviews.Content: Bought as replacement for old units. Fortunately, I have not experienced their utility. Units seem to be well-made, and installed easily.

Reviews.Title: Annoying
Reviews.Author: Jaromir Kovarik
Reviews.Content: Installation and look are OK.  However, the visula  and audi features are confusing.  I ams till not sure if the sytem is signalling that it is alert and functioning properly or that there is a malfunction.  Manual does not help much.  Would not buy this one again.

Reviews.Title: First alert sa320cn
Reviews.Author: keith van meter
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 of these detector.  No problems installing and have had no false alarms like I had with our old units.  Testing indicates that they are working fine.  Remember to change out every 10 years

Reviews.Title: good fucntion
Reviews.Author: Satoshi Mochizuki "TM"
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice. I do not understand why this type of sensors is not mandatory.  The price difference is minimal and every house hold should have it.  This is also easy to install.

Reviews.Title: no false alarms yet.
Reviews.Author: Bvus
Reviews.Content: My existing First alert conventional detector was going off all the time.  I switched it with this one and the false alarms have stopped.

Reviews.Title: Safe & Sound!
Reviews.Author: Nanette
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace a smoke detector that did not have the carbon monoxide,and after searching the reviews I decided on this one.  I have not had to useit (which is a good thing!) in a fire, but I feel safe knowing I have a duo detector!

Reviews.Title: Seems to work.
Reviews.Author: Keleh
Reviews.Content: It is easy to install, and tested out OK. If it ever saves me from a fire, I will give it five stars.

Reviews.Title: Great ratings from testing labs
Reviews.Author: Over 65 in Texas
Reviews.Content: I bought these after I saw a news clip about a family dying in a hone with the ionization only smoke detectors.  These detect both smoldering and burning fires.

Reviews.Title: BOY IT IS LOUD
Reviews.Author: EMILY MA'RY
Reviews.Content: SAW THIS ADVERTIZED ON TV AS THE BEST THERE IS.  SO I FIGURED I BETTER TRY IT.  IT IS ALL I EXPECTED AND MORE.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: E. Zalisko
Reviews.Content: I bought a household of these. The dual function is good safety. Just price compare to be sure you are getting the best buy.

Reviews.Title: Double sensor a must!
Reviews.Author: S. E. Weatherby "weterb"
Reviews.Content: A double sensor system is a must. Ion and photo give much better protection from fire. Item is easy to hang.

Reviews.Title: A solid smoke dector
Reviews.Author: Donald L. Wood
Reviews.Content: Easy installation. The battery compartment makes it easy to change batteries. The double sensor makes this alarm the top of line.

Reviews.Title: A must have two sensor detector for everyone
Reviews.Author: A. Ziolkowski
Reviews.Content: After hearing news reports of how most smoke detectors do not work to detect many fires, I rushed to replace all our smoke detectors. Even though I just replaced them all when we moved into an older home 18 months ago. I just hope we never need to use them.

Reviews.Title: First Alert SA320CN Alarm
Reviews.Author: Skeptic
Reviews.Content: We put six of these into operation in July. They were easy to install and test. We have not had any false alarms in the 4+ months they have been activated. We are very pleased with these units, and I would definitely purchase this model again.

Reviews.Title: Bought 4, All Worked Well
Reviews.Author: RightReviewNow
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these alarms and have had no problems with any so far.  Dual sensor is a must for safety, even though the price is a little high in my opinion, still worth purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: OhYouKnow
Reviews.Content: Dual Sensors are othe only way to go!+++ = (At this time) Easy to install and test- - - = Non at this time.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: M. J. Veteto
Reviews.Content: I had seen news programs about installing dual sensor alarms being much safer. We were due to replace our current alarms so I went looking and found this one.  It was easy to install and tests great.

Reviews.Title: Bought two
Reviews.Author: Doug "Douglas Luther Rothenberg"
Reviews.Content: I bought two based on the other reviews. My existing alarms worked when I had a recent problem with my water heater and called 911, but I wanted to make sure that I had both types of smoke detectors on each floor in addition to my CO2 detectors.

Reviews.Title: First one, DOA. Second works great.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Dejong
Reviews.Content: I ordered one, which was damaged on arrival. The unit sounded three chirps every couple of minutes. Of course, there was nothing in the manual to indicate what that might mean. Finally I saw online that three chirps meant an internal defect in some other first alert alarms. So I filed a return/replacement with amazon. The second device works great (I.e. tests well. Haven't had to use the smoke dection yet.)

Reviews.Title: First Alert for smoldering fires
Reviews.Author: Gigi
Reviews.Content: Hopefully we will never need it, but since we recently escaped a smoldering fire by luck, I don't want like to take a chance. I like that this detector has side slide for battery.

Reviews.Title: Early Days but looking really good
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Just got it and installed it today. Compared with home center products this model is really quality. The directions and lawyereese cautions just go on and on, but the product is there. It weighs twice as much as the el cheapos at Home Depot. Funny detail, the instructions say to use only with Ever Ready AA type E91 batteries, But it comes with a pair of AA Duracells. I have thrown away so many smoke detectors, I hope this one stays around. The cheap detectors I've been using for decades were bought on special at a little over $10 at kMart or some such place, but they start falsing in a year or two, and their replacement 9v batteries don't fit in well. I'm replacing three of those types (which still work when I blow tobacco smoke at them) with three more of this model. Having both technology types in the one detector should be a law. My family's worth it.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my home
Reviews.Author: M. David "emsgirl"
Reviews.Content: After learning more about double sensor fire/smoke alarms, I felt this was the product to fit my needs. Also, First Alert being a trusted Brand name, and I must so far I'm more than pleased knowing I have this protection throughout my home.

Reviews.Title: Dual sensor smoke alarm
Reviews.Author: J. Lilly
Reviews.Content: Working as advertized....so far.Arrived quickly, well packed. etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc

Reviews.Title: Great Alarm
Reviews.Author: William P. Provias
Reviews.Content: Tried it out already and works great!! We only had it up 2 days when they came to install a new furnace and it went off from them trying out.

Reviews.Title: dual alarms
Reviews.Author: ROJAN
Reviews.Content: we purchased these alarms to replace the singles we have had for quite some time.  These fit in the same footprint requiring no new holes and no touch up required for a great cover-up installation.Product is great with AA batteries instead of the 9 volt in the old ones.

Reviews.Title: Works as Intended
Reviews.Author: mav
Reviews.Content: Great product that works as intended.  Tested product after installation with several types of smoke, responded quickly and accurately.  Easy installation, ease of access to batteries is a plus.

Reviews.Title: super simple installation
Reviews.Author: Mary H.
Reviews.Content: I guess I'll give this 5 stars even though I hope to never see if it actually works.  It was so easy to install.  Really well thought out.  And the little battery drawer will make changing the batteries easy also.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Ricky New
Reviews.Content: This appears to be a very good product at a reasonable price.However, it would be even better if the Green indicator light would be brighter since the unit is mounted on the wall fairly high to see easily.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product
Reviews.Author: P. Waxler "khane9"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my home, the alarms arrived when promised they all work and came with their own batteries.  Thank you first alert for a great product and the piece of mind

Reviews.Title: First Alert SA320CN Double Sensor Smoke/Fire Alarm
Reviews.Author: James D.
Reviews.Content: We bought this to supplement our other alarms.  Having both types of sensors (ionization and photocell) provides coverage for both flaming and smoldering type fires.  There have so far been no false triggering on this alarm.

Reviews.Title: Happy with this purchase..v. easy to do
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: The purchase came through very quickly & was easy to do. Very happy with the product! Would recommend this product as it works very well.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: your home
Reviews.Content: this is a great ideal for a smoke and fire alarm all in one,  i love how easy it was to put up, it a great ideal for your home.

Reviews.Title: Very gooid smoke detector
Reviews.Author: D. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Excellent product and the price was very good.  Shipped on time and arrived in proper condition.  I would buy the item again when I need to.

Reviews.Title: Replaced two old alarms with two of these
Reviews.Author: Steven J. Sprigler
Reviews.Content: I've had two of these since around the end of June 2011.  I've yet to have a single issue with them and I've tested them twice since purchase.  The installation was super easy and took maybe 5 minutes total to install both units.  The convenience of being able to use AA batteries too is a huge plus over more expensive 9V batteries.

Reviews.Title: Easily Set Off By Shower Steam - Broken!
Reviews.Author: PenguinSage
Reviews.Content: Double-sensor alarm? Fantastic! I'll be extra safe. Heck, I'll take 2! One for the main floor of my home, and one for the basement! I am awesome for getting such a great piece of safety equipment!Such were my thoughts for the first 3-4 weeks of having this smoke detector installed.And then...One night a very steamy shower sets off the smoke detector, which is in the hallway outside the bathroom. I chide my husband for his ludicrous amount of steam and scoff that it's not possibly the fault of my precious new smoke detectors (did I mention they have dual sensors? DUAL SENSORS! I'm so safe and awesome). Maybe he shouldn't take such prissy showers!Then I took a shower the next morning. And fearing mockage, I kept the shower a little cool, and secretly opened the window to fan out all the steam I could before opening the bathroom door. I was ready to be smug about the perfection of my smoke detector. Door opens, and BEEEEEEEEEEEEP! The thing goes off. Crap. I swear, take the thing down and put it back up later that day.Next morning I shower, cranky, grumbling about the smoke detector, and while I'm still in the shower with the bathroom door closed, it starts going off. BEEEEEEEEEEEEP! Double crap. The thing's broken and getting worse.Husband is kind and insists that it's probably just defective or a spider crapped on the sensor or something. And, look! We have another one still in its package that we can install, tossing out the "old" one. Hooray! Safety returns. I even forget about the smoke detector and don't even feel jumpy during my next shower 2 days later. Then just as I'm lathering the shampoo: BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEP! Holy mother of crap!LESSON: These detectors are VERY sensitive to steam. I'm sure they also do a great job detecting fires, but in a small ranch-style house where there aren't many "ideal" places to put one of these things, this just won't work. Now I'm out money and a little freaked out about showering.

Reviews.Title: Not entirely happy.
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these and one of them crapped out after a year.  It kept going off, so I changed the batteries several times and it still kept going off.  I have no idea what was setting this thing off.  My other one is still going strong so I guess this product is a hit or miss.

Reviews.Title: smoke detector
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Not much to say. It seems to work when I test it. It's loud and works when I test it with the test button. Hopefully I'll never have to find out If it really works. It senses two kinds of smoke particles for better protection. Its a name brand and it was easy enough to install. It came with plastic anchors and mounting screws.

Reviews.Title: Senses boths types of fire
Reviews.Author: Jf
Reviews.Content: Great smoke detectors. These can detect both smoldering and burst fires. I bought several for my entire house, all are working well.

Reviews.Title: Maybe I'm wrong THIS SEEMS TO BE A GOOD ALARM
Reviews.Author: of california
Reviews.Content: I was impressed  when I received this detector looks very well done I hope it works as good as it looks ...

Reviews.Title: Seems good
Reviews.Author: Arie Ripley
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and to install.  Too early as ye to todetermine how well it operates.  Time will tell

Reviews.Title: Good news for packaging-challenged!
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Freedman "Admirer of I.S."
Reviews.Content: I am replacing each Kidde alarm in the house with a First Alert SA320CN Double Sensor Battery-Powered Smoke and Fire Alarm.The good news is that I can actually open the secure hard plastic packaging without having to employ a knife or industrial weight shears or a torch of some sort.There is a place into which I can insert my thumb or other digit of choice and pull back the covering sheet of plastic. And then I can just lift out the item; no rivets, no hidden twisties, no molded shapes obstructing the removal of the alarm.  One great victory for the packing-challenged! My deep gratitude goes out to the designer.

Reviews.Title: Now I feel safer...
Reviews.Author: Florida Pat
Reviews.Content: Our hard-wired home smoke/fire alarms are mounted about 12' up which makes them almost impossible to test or change batteries. These First Alert SA320CN Double Sensor Battery-Powered Smoke and Fire Alarms were easy to mount just over the doorways, under the existing alarms. Now I feel safer.Definitely don't hesitate!

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Ken S.
Reviews.Content: Received 1 day early. Easily installed (45 minutes for all 4). Tested with smoke,fire, and with button. No holes drilled as they fit right into the old alarm holes. They have been in use for 3 weeks and no false alarms. I am very satisfied (unusual for me). They do not have a carbon dioxide alarm and were not advertised as having such. In my case, it is not needed as I have an all electric home and a detached garage. The price was good too. Having 2AA batteries is a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Easy installation
Reviews.Author: J. Green
Reviews.Content: There was Kiddle Sensors installed in this house and where old.  Decided to go with the First alert as it has the same warranty, life expectance but at a better price. Also I do not have to have one sensor for fire and another one for Gas

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: JR-6
Reviews.Content: Smoke detector was easy to install. It is quite sensative. Batteries are easy to replace.The price is reasonable and the packaging was excellent.

Reviews.Title: First Alert
Reviews.Author: sandra tavela
Reviews.Content: We replaced our old first alert smoke and fire alarm with this new first alert smoke and fire alarm.  We like the new one.

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: BillP
Reviews.Content: I put it in the corner of the kitchen and it goes off when something is burning in the toaster.  I had a little trouble with the "hush" button but possibly I wasn't holding it down long enough.

Reviews.Title: Combines photo electric and ionization sensors in one alarm that can be AC powered
Reviews.Author: Ogilvie
Reviews.Content: One of the very few alarms that combine photo electric and ionization sensors in one alarm (one can detect smoke, but not flames, the other can detect flames, but not smoke) that can be AC powered and linked to other household alarms. Will this cause a myriad of false alarms that traumatize the whole family? Only time will tell

Reviews.Title: False alarms near kitchen, bypass feature unreliable
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I bought this 4-pack for the whole house and have no issues other than in the hallway to the kitchen.  I selected this one due to good reviews on average and because of its dual sensor and bypass features.My wife cooks frequently.  After I installed one of these units in the hallway off the kitchen my wife would frequently complain that the bypass feature to disable the alarm did not work for her.  I was there one time when this happened and for me it stopped and then I went to another room.  But she swears that it only works this way half the time.My wife has since taken the battery out due to the false alarms and the bypass feature not working for her.  So now I have to seek out and try other brands.  I wish I had not bought a 4-pack in the first place.  I can only hope that ones that I installed in other areas of the house are just as sensitive as this one and that they do what they are supposed to do if there is a fire of any sort.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, & no false alarms so far
Reviews.Author: Jose R. Vazquez
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, & no false alarms.Uses AAA batteries not the expensive 9v typesGreat price compared to local stores.

Reviews.Title: Well, unless my house catches on fire, how could I have an opinion of this?
Reviews.Author: Arnold Ziffel "AZ"
Reviews.Content: So far, it appears to be working fine.  Again, if it's not working, how would someone know that?  I am replacing one that's 8 years old only due to flaky operation.  It's just not worth $25 to be unsure if you are protected.  I have discovered that drywall dust will ruin the sensors; the alarm goes off and no matter how much cleaning you try to apply, it will never shut up again.  If you are repairing drywall, wrap your smoke alarm in plastic til you are done.

Reviews.Title: First alert smoke detectors
Reviews.Author: Sharon Carroll
Reviews.Content: We were looking for new smoke detectors for our motor home and these seemed to fit the bill.  We were pleased at how quickly they arrived.

Reviews.Title: required headline
Reviews.Author: irish_setter
Reviews.Content: Tests great and I hope I never have to get actual use out of it.  This is the next five words required (six actually, now ten)

Reviews.Title: Functionally OK
Reviews.Author: XiMiX
Reviews.Content: It works fine. It does not look good as other brands, though. It is sticks out more from the ceiling and more noticeable.It could look a little nicer.

Reviews.Title: Trusted brand
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: It looks good, Tests ok. No fires or smoke so How do I know if it will work I have to trust the brand

Reviews.Title: Safety Always
Reviews.Author: AmericanPatrick
Reviews.Content: We changed out the household units to dual sensor. When we added another garage this unit only made sense. Be sure & change your battery every year !

Reviews.Title: Easy to Follow Instructions
Reviews.Author: Henz73
Reviews.Content: This product installed easily by following the manufacturer's instructions.  It tested successfully and appears to have been fully operational since installation.

Reviews.Title: Bob G
Reviews.Author: Robert S. Graham
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 double sensor smoke detectors and successfully tested same before installing. Time will tell how long the units will last but I have been very pleased with First Alert products in the past and don't expect any different results with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: First quality Fire Sensor
Reviews.Author: Henry Halladay "Slide show creator"
Reviews.Content: The First Alert arrived promptly and was packed in a box with the original factory bax inside. The product was purchased as replacements for a failed sensor (years of use) and fit my existing fixture mount. The sensor set up was simple and the unit tested perfectly. The dual sensor I feel is important to home safety. I would certainly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: joegrammer
Reviews.Content: I got tired of my old detectors going off during high humidity - they were a little over 10 years old.  Swapping these out was very simple and quick.  And no more false alarms.

Reviews.Title: -Nice And Sensitive-
Reviews.Author: SickLittleBoy
Reviews.Content: Extremely sensitive. These are of good quality and work as advertised. I have 10 of these guys and have had absolutely no problems. Easy to install and are both Ionization/Photoelectric. Highly Recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Great for it's value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my Son's room, the install was easy and it looks great.This gives me a peace of mind knowing that if there is a fire in my Son's room I would know about it.I am very happy with this product and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Ugly and impossible to see light
Reviews.Author: Impetigo
Reviews.Content: Low rating due to two things.First, this alarm is very unattractive due to it's octagonal type shape (e.g. not purely round) and the fact that it is quite tall.  The Kidde alarms are nice because they are a bit wider but flatter and sleeker.The second issue is the deal breaker for me, and that is the light that flashes every minute or so (to indicate that it's operating) is so tiny and hard to see that I have difficulty seeing it when standing right in front/under it.  Even in the dark it's very difficult to see, and good luck trying to see it from more than a few feet away or at an angle.  None of these issues with the Kidde Model Pi9010 Dual Sensor, Battery Operated Photoelectric / Ionization Smoke Alarm we went with (which is also a dual photoelectric/ionization alarm though).  In the Kidde alarm, the light that flashes is easy to see no matter where you are.I bought four of these First Alert alarms and returned three of them and will probably donate the first one I bought and installed.

Reviews.Title: First Alert -First Rate
Reviews.Author: Ronald Stiteler "Ron"
Reviews.Content: I have been using "First Alert" products for years & have always been confident they would do as advertised.They always have & if there was any problem the company was right there to take care of it. What more can you ask for ?

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: After one month the batteries went dead. Put in new batteries, and a week later I was getting low battery signal. The green indicator does not come on, that means it's not active.

Reviews.Title: great safety item
Reviews.Author: debbie m
Reviews.Content: We just wish that it also contained a carbon monoxide detector and didn't think about that when ordering this item

Reviews.Title: First Alert
Reviews.Author: D. SMITH
Reviews.Content: I have not bought a newer model in a long time and the price of this was really good. Hopefully I won't have to find out how well it will work.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Brian J
Reviews.Content: They came a a timely fashion...I like the Idea of the double sensor....They came with batteries but after reading other reviews I put the lithium batteries in hoping they last a little longer......easy to install. kept the old smoke detectors in place and put up new ones...very good product....hope I never need to use them......

Reviews.Title: defective out of the box
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Item went off a few seconds after putting the batteries in. I am not sure if it was a defective test button or if the unit really was sensing smoke when there was none. The red LED light blinked two seconds on, two seconds off.

Reviews.Title: First Alert Double Sensor Smoke Detector
Reviews.Author: D. Ives "Dave_I_WI"
Reviews.Content: Installed ok. Haven't tested it. Assume it will work as advertised. Easy to follow instructions. Hard to open plastic package

Reviews.Title: easy to replace older units
Reviews.Author: J. Labore
Reviews.Content: No way to review on the performance since we have not had a fire. This review is based on price and ease of installation and ease of battery replacement.  They were very easy to install.  I had to drill one new hole since the patterns did not match the old units but that takes all of 30 seconds. Be sure to wear safety glasses or you will have drywall dust in your eyes.  The main reason I bought them is because they have the dual sensor which is the only type our local fire department recommends.  They came in the hard to open clam shells.  A four pack in basic cardboard packaging would be a great option.  The battery tray slides out which is not good or bad. just don't bend it and break it off. I suppose you could replace the batteries without un-mounting from the ceiling but why bother. They are very easy to unscrew from the ceiling mount so it will be a snap to replace the batteries.

Reviews.Title: Not as described on line
Reviews.Author: frog309
Reviews.Content: Listed as having a remote mute feature. I did not. That feature was why a purchased. I returned for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Shop online first!
Reviews.Author: bmw325alex
Reviews.Content: I purchased this odd item and various other items for less than %50 of list store price. Always shop online first!

Reviews.Title: What a deal.
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is amazing. I shopped in my neighborhood first. Then found a super deal on Ebay. I'm now an Ebay fan.

Reviews.Title: Nice Smoke Alarm - shipped QUICK too!
Reviews.Author: Geno "Geno"
Reviews.Content: So far so good - the test button works and the alarm is nice and LOUD.  I hope I NEVER have to find out how well it works but hopefully it provides the protection that it advertises.

Reviews.Title: as expected
Reviews.Author: K from Minnesota
Reviews.Content: I received the products as ordered, they arrived when expected and were just what I had ordered.I would order from Amazon again with out any questions.

Reviews.Title: Not a Carbon Monoxide Detector
Reviews.Author: Language Learner
Reviews.Content: This is not a Carbon Monoxide DetectorI bought it because I thought dual meant smoke and carbon monoxide sensors but it means 2 ways to detect smoke (which may well be a very good thing-but if you want carbon monoxide protection this is not the one).  Also the packaging says “The #1 Most Trusted Brand In Smoke, Fire and Carbon Monoxide Protection.” Key word = brand, so it is misleading.I think more explanation is necessary from somewhere. Do we need both this dual sensor type smoke alarm and carbon monoxide sensors side by side to best protect ourselves?

Reviews.Title: It works I guess
Reviews.Author: David G. Haddad "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Seems to work. Installs easily.Need to fill up this box so I can submit. I have not actually tested it beyond the button

Reviews.Title: I would use another character.
Reviews.Author: Faded
Reviews.Content: First of all, I have to say that this product is overrated and falls outside the Top 10. When I first opened it from its packaging and finished mounting it to the ceiling, it began shaking and canceling into a drop to the floor. This is very unsafe. Not only can it fall on someone's head, but it can't even block for several frames.When it was finally installed, I admit, I felt safe. Using this product, I felt confident that I could parry any fires, and reset the situation anytime. But then I realized this is just one MU. When the time came to put this product to the test, it failed to deliver. My first match was against the Carbon Monoxide that built up in my apartment. Once it got in, there was nothing I could do except cancel my pokes into a Smoke Away, but my options were too limited, I was pressured to death in the corner, and ultimately sent to Losers Hospital because of CO poisoning, which isn't a surprise due to this mediocre Smoke alarm.I later discovered that it can't detect other conditions that frequently occur in my home either, including the intoxicating fumes of my cat's poop, approaching tornadoes, and Kabal. I can only see it working on Noob-level fumes.Overall, I would only recommend this Smoke alarm for casual play, but not to win majors. It has too many losing MUs against common natural conditions to be considered tournament viable.

ProductInfo.Features:
Utilizes both ionization and photoelectric smoke sensors for optimal performance
Intelligent sensing technology reduces non-emergency or nuisance alarms
Operates on 2 AA batteries (included)
Optimized sensor performance for the most nuisance-resistant dual sensor alarm on the market
ProductInfo.Name: First Alert SA320CN Double Sensor Battery-Powered Smoke and Fire Alarm
